title: From English to SQL: Oracle APEX AI Bridges the Language Gap
author: Darryl K Taft
description: Oracle has added AI capabilities to its APEX low-code development platform, which enables users to use natural language to generate SQL statements.
cntitle: 从英语到 SQL：Oracle APEX AI 弥合语言鸿沟
cndescription: 甲骨文在其 APEX 低代码开发平台中添加了 AI 功能，使用户能够使用自然语言生成 SQL 语句。
